snippet: As I entered the last week of 2011, I had more than $300,000 in cash on hand, plenty of work lined up for the coming year, and a dilemma: Who gets the money?
abstract: As I entered the last week of 2011, I had more than $300,000 in cash on hand, plenty of work lined up for the coming year, and a dilemma: Who gets the money?

headline.main: What I Take Out of the Business
